title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 125.5 - Retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 125.5 - Retention of records

State Regulations

Each electric corporation and each municipality providing
electric service shall maintain for at least six years a record meeting the
requirements of sections
125.1
and
125.2
of this Part for each
accident in any way connected with or growing out of its electric utility
operations and resulting in injury to any person. Said corporation or
municipality shall make such records available for inspection by the
commission's staff and shall, when requested, provide the staff with
information on any such accident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
125.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
